Package SpaceShooters

Class Player

java.lang.Object
SpaceShooters.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game, managing player-specific attributes and actions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Player(int level, int normalModeLevel, PlayerShipData shipData, int experience, double money, String username)
    Constructs a Player object with specified initial attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int level, int normalModeLevel, PlayerShipData shipData, int experience, double money, String username)
      Constructs a Player object with specified initial attributes.
      Parameters:
      level - The player's current level.
      normalModeLevel - The player's level in normal mode.
      shipData - The data representing the player's ship.
      experience - The player's current experience points.
      money - The player's current money.
      username - The player's username.
